column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////After lunch
column2: my sisters and I came for dessert. The only reason why there isn't 5 stars is because it's small and it was super crowded. Other than that
column3: this place has the most amazing macarons. There were all different flavors but I only got three. Lavender vanilla
column4: strawberry and apple pie. I will be coming back to try all the rest of them. Hands down
column5: some of the best in town that's for sure.
